page.title: 15Employment / Industry
page.content:
The main industry in the village is the firm of J.Wareing and Son which is an agricultural and industrial building contractor. This firm employs 60 workers many living in the village. The firm's main aim is "to serve the farmer with a specialised service in the fabrication and erection of farm buildings".
Wareings believe that they were the pioneers of kit buildings delivered in kit form complete with instructions. These kits have been supplied to all areas of Great Britain, to the Isle of Man, the Isle of Wight and even 2 kits were sent to the Falkland Islands. The Sudan has also received 10 buildings and trailers in connection with a scheme to help underpriviledged countries.
